Fay Grim

Ano: 2006

Sinopse: A ten-years-later continuation of Hal Hartley's "Henry Fool", where Fay Grim (Posey) is coerced by a CIA agent (Goldblum) to try to locate notebooks that belonged to her deceased husband (Ryan). The CIA believe the notebooks contain information that could compromises the security of the U.S. There are others who also want the notebooks, and they'll stop at nothing to get them. Fay is sent to Europe and the Middle East, where she uses all her street smarts to outwit her competitors on a secret mission worthy of 007 himself to retrieve the notebooks. On her journey, she makes a shocking discovery that forces her to a decision make-or-break point.—Paula
